1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Syntax.Message
4  ( -- * Abortable
5    abCode,
6    -- * Message
7    extraCloseBracket,
8    extraOpenBracket,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture            as O
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Abort          as B
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO             as B
14
15abCode :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> O.Map (B.Ab b)
16abCode = B.abortable "code"
17
18-- | Extra close bracket
19extraCloseBracket :: B.Ab a
20extraCloseBracket = Left $ B.abortBecause "Extra close bracket"
21
22-- | Unclosed open bracket
23extraOpenBracket :: B.Ab a
24extraOpenBracket = Left $ B.abortBecause "Unclosed open bracket"
25
